name: Tata Tiago NRG
description: The price of Tata Tiago NRG, a 5 seater Hatchback, ranges from Rs. 6.70  - 8.80 Lakh. It is available in 6 variants, with an engine of 1199 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Tiago NRG has an NCAP rating of 4 stars and comes with 2 airbags. Tata Tiago NRG has a ground clearance of 181 mm  and is available in 4 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 20.09 to 26.49 kmpl for Tiago NRG.
